headline: Has Tapestry’s 2024 Rally Left Much Upside After DCF and Earnings Multiple Checks?
summary: If you are wondering whether Tapestry has already had its big run or if there is still value left on the table, you are not alone. That is exactly what we are going to unpack. The stock has been on a tear, up 1.8% over the last week, 20.1% over the past month, 91.1% year to date and 98.6% in the last year, with multi year gains of 263.4% over 3 years and 360.2% over 5 years. Those moves have come as investors refocus on premium brands and scale benefits in accessories and luxury, while...
